amendment.description: To establish an airspace management advisory committee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3526 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3526 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Flake to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1876-1878; text: CR S1877) To establish an airspace management advisory committee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3526 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3526 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Flake to Amendment SA 3464.
